pages.text: The room with a circle symbol must be a room for explorers because it has a map that leads to some sort of a composer, as it says on the back.$(br2)$(o) This has to be the place were they create charm recipes.

It has a legend:$(br2) Aquamarine - Freedom$(br) Gold - Mountain$(br) Indigo - Aid$(br) Ivory - Safety$(br) Lime - Nature$(br) Maroon - Heat$(br) Silver - Fight$(br) Teal - Growth$(br) Violet - Ghost$(br2) After investigating this village, I should head there.
